channel.title: nebs on Deeper Breaths
channel.description: Recent content in nebs on Deeper Breaths

item.title: Airway Clearance Therapy
item.description: Airway Clearance Therapy www.smartvest.com IPV - Intrapulmonary Percussive Ventilation delivers small bursts of air through a mouthpiece into lungs, vibrates chest, loosens mucus deep in airways. Www. verywellhealth.com OHFO - Oral High Frequency Oscillation low volume, high frequency jet oscillation to lungs through a mouthpiece. Uses sound frequency, helps clear carbon dioxide and sputum. Same website PEP - Positive Epiratory Pressure use facemask or mouthpiece while inhaling and exhaling as normal.
